casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert C. LONG. No. 610P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 2, 2005. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Robert Christopher Long. Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of November 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of November 2005."
